Hi, I'm Abdulkareem Akbik, a Grade 11 student with a strong passion for technology and innovation. I specialize in many things, and I‚Äôm always exploring new ways to solve real-world problems through creative thinking and technical skills. Whether it‚Äôs coding, building projects, or learning about the latest advancements in tech, I enjoy challenging myself and pushing my abilities to the next level.

1. OverviewThis Privacy and Cookies Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect information from users of this website. By using this site, you agree to the practices described below.2. Use of CookiesCookies are small files stored on your device that help improve your experience. We use cookies to support website functions, analyze traffic, and remember user preferences. These cookies can be first-party (set by us) or third-party (set by services we use).3. Types of Cookies We UseStrictly Necessary Cookies: Required for basic site functions. Without these, the site may not work properly.Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use the site so we can improve its design and performance.Functionality Cookies: Remember choices you make, like language or region.Targeting Cookies: Used to show ads that match your interests.4. Third-Party CookiesSome third-party tools (like analytics services) may place their own cookies on your device. These services follow their own privacy rules, and we recommend reviewing their policies.5. Cookie Consent and ControlWhen you first visit the site, you‚Äôll see a notice about our cookie use. You can choose to accept or reject non-essential cookies. You can also change your cookie settings anytime in your browser. Keep in mind, disabling cookies may affect how some parts of the site work.6. Data Collection and UseWe may use cookies to collect non-personal information (such as browsing behavior) to help us improve the site. We do not collect personal information like your name or contact details unless you provide them directly.7. Copyright and Image OwnershipAll content on this website, including photos and images, is protected by copyright and is the property of the site owner unless stated otherwise. You may not copy, use, share, or reproduce any images or media from this website without written permission. Unauthorized use of any content may result in legal action.8. Changes to This PolicyWe may update this policy as needed. Changes will take effect right after we post them on this page. Please check back from time to time to stay informed.9. Contact UsIf you have any questions or concerns about this policy or how we use cookies, feel free to reach out using the contact form on our website.

I'm a Grade 11 high school student. I'm passionate about technology, design, and creative problem-solving. Most of what I do is self-taught, so excuse me if I make mistakes. I am mostly interested in photography and videography. Whether that be with my drone or my decade-old camera, I always try to capture the moment in the best lens possible. Below are some of the first photos I ever took on my DJI Mini 3, and I think it has been uphill from there. From when I was younger, I was always interested in technology. I would convince my parents to buy those cheap drones that never really worked out because it was always windy outside. I also convinced them to get cheap smartwatches that would operate at 2 fps. To be honest, this site is just a space to share what I'm working on and what I care about. Thanks for stopping by!
Follow me online to find out when I launch.
